goal.en: We will learn how to read poems and photographs closely, how to make observations about them, how to transform observations into claims, how to research supporting evidence for those claims, finally, how to build an argument-driven paper about them.
goal.ch: We will learn how to read poems and photographs closely, how to make observations about them, how to transform observations into claims, how to research supporting evidence for those claims, finally, how to build an argument-driven paper about them.

content.en: This is a seminar based writing course, there is no lecture content. Students who do not engage in class discussion will fail the course.
content.ch: This is a seminar based writing course, there is no lecture content. Students who do not engage in class discussion will fail the course.

textbook.en: Intro to Poetry Textbook (extracts from Nims, Western Wind, will be put on ee-class), Selected Photographs
